abstract: Brokers have been hired to aggressively market the retail space at the hexagonal building known as the Corner that once housed J. P. Morgan headquarters.
snippet: Brokers have been hired to aggressively market the retail space at the hexagonal building known as the Corner that once housed J. P. Morgan headquarters.
lead_paragraph: The intersection of Wall and Broad Streets, when J. P. Morgan’s headquarters at 23 Wall Street glowered sternly over a daily parade of stock brokers and tourists, was the epicenter of the financial world.

headline.main: J.P. Morgan’s Fortress, Long Vacant, Looks For Upscale Tenants
headline.print_headline: J.P. Morgan’s Fortress, Long Vacant, Looks For Upscale Tenants
